sourcesContent:
<template>
    <a-modal title="新建角色" :visible="value" @cancel="bindClickCancel" @ok="bindClickSubmit" cancelText="取消" okText="提交">
        <a-form :form="form">
            <a-form-item label="角色名称" v-bind="formItemLayout">
                <a-input placeholder="角色名称" v-decorator="roleDecorator.roleName"/>
            </a-form-item>
            <a-form-item label="角色描述" v-bind="formItemLayout">
                <a-textarea placeholder="角色描述" :rows="4" v-decorator="roleDecorator.roleDescription"/>
            </a-form-item>
            <a-form-item label="角色状态" v-bind="formItemLayout">
                <a-switch v-decorator="roleDecorator.roleStatus"/>
            </a-form-item>
        </a-form>
    </a-modal>
</template>

<script>
    import {RoleApi} from '@/api';
    import {FormMixin} from '@/mixins';

    export default {
        name: "RoleCreate",
        mixins: [FormMixin],
        props: {
            value: {
                type: Boolean,
                default: false
            }
        },
        methods: {
            createRole(role) {
                RoleApi.create(role).then(() => {
                    this.bindClickCancel();
                    this.$emit("success");
                });
            },
            bindClickSubmit() {
                this.form.validateFields((err, values) => {
                    if (!err) this.createRole(values);
                });
            },
            bindClickCancel() {
                this.form.resetFields();
                this.$emit("input", false);
            }
        }
    }
</script>
